awd_titl_txt: A Plan to Introduce Lasers and Computers into the Physical  Chemistry Laboratory
awd_abstract_narration: The laboratory curriculum in Physical Chemistry often does not                  reflect current research in the field.  The Department of                       Chemistry at Loyola University of Chicago will address this                     problem by establishing a sequence of undergraduate experiments                 that involve the use of both lasers and computers.                                                                                                              This ILI award from the Chemistry Shared Instrumentation                        Program will help the Department acquire laser, optical and                     computer instrumentation that will be used to enhance                           undergraduate laboratory instruction and aid in chemistry                       curriculum development.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
